label: Loomio
tag line: Make inclusive, quality decisions without meetings.
Description1: Loomio is a safe, easily accessible place to communicate and make quality decisions together.  Engage with people, save time and keep everything in one place.
Description2:
Loomio envisions a world where everyone can participate in the decisions that affect them. Loomio's open source software provides a safe, easily accessible place to communicate and make quality decisions together.

**Collaborate purposefully**
Work together to turn discussion into action. 
Include remote people, gain insights with diverse participation and hear from quieter people.

**Save precious time**
Have fewer meetings and make better use of your precious time together.
Reduce email and take back control of your inbox. 

**Keep a record**
Decisions made on Loomio are transparent and form a searchable archive. 
Meet compliance obligations with an auditable decision trail.

Learn more at loomio.org
Open feedback: feel free to poke around our site, particularly help.loomio.org, in order to figure out the licensing - I'm uncertain how we've done that and won't have time to check with teammates in near future
